biotools.summary: Repository for pancreatic-derived -omics data. It includes easurements derived from transcriptomics, proteomics, genomics and miRNA profiles from various pancreas-centred reports on a broad range of specimen and experimental types.

bioschemas.name: Pancreatic Expression Database (PED)
